text: @SecPompeo @realDonaldTrump President @realDonaldTrump has taken tepid action in response to the #Coronavirus. The steps the President announced in regard to Europe panicked global markets — our highest priority — and were literally the very least you can do to confront a virus in modern history. #FixedIt
